|cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu2_brand=Broadcom |cpu2_model=BCM6368;BCM6368KPBG; |cpu2_cspeed=400 |cpu2_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=NAND01GW3B2CZA6 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G83EFA |ram1_num=4 |ram2=32 |ram2_brand=Nanya |ram2_model=NT5DS16M16DS-5T |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0, SATA, SFP |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=1 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |wi1_module=Cameo WLX-0205 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8366;88W8366-BDK2; |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8063 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6161;88E6161-LG02; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=SFP Port GbE Switch/Transceiver;Marvell;88E1118R;Alaska;1; |flags=ADSL2+, DECT, VoIP, Femtocell, Fiber Optic Link |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |oui=F4:CA:E5 |oui_eth=F4:CA:E5 }} {{TagLine|Freebox 6 Revolution Internet Box}} :[http://www.free.fr/adsl/ Product page] It succeed to the ''Freebox 5'' (last released in 2008). {{See also|Freebox Crystal 1 (F-ADSL05R)}} This box has a empty area designed to receive a (optionnal) [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Femtocell Femtocell] adapter. *[https://fr.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freebox ''Freebox 6 (Revolution)'' on '''Wikipedia'''] (FR) :Server: CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6281 / [[Broadcom]] BCM6368; Memory: 128MB/512+32MB *[https://www.tomshardware.fr/freebox-revolution-au-tour-du-player/7 ''Freebox Revolution Player'' on '''TomsHardware'''] (FR) :Player: CPU: [[Intel Atom]] CE4150 @1.2GHz / Intel GMA 500; Memory: 256MB/1GB *[https://h-node.org/wifi/view/en/1963/Marvell-Technology-Group-Ltd--88W8366--TopDog--802-11n-Wireless Marvell 88W8366 (TopDog) 802.11n Wireless Adapter] :[[Marvell]] 88W8366 [11ab:2a43] 
lspci
Ethernet controller: Marvell 88W8366 [TopDog] 802.11n Wireless

lspci -vmmnn
Vendor:	Marvell Technology Group Ltd. [11ab]
Device:	88W8366 [TopDog] 802.11n Wireless [2a43]
SVendor:	Marvell Technology Group Ltd. [11ab]
SDevice:	88W8366 [TopDog] 802.11n Wireless [2a43]

lspci -nnk
Ethernet controller: Marvell 88W8366 [TopDog] 802.11n Wireless [11ab:2a43]
	Subsystem: Marvell 88W8366 [TopDog] 802.11n Wireless [11ab:2a43]
	Kernel modules: mwl8k
===Models=== *Freebox V1 (2002): [[IDT]] 79RC32355 @180MHz *Freebox V2 (2003): [[IDT]] 79RC32355 @180MHz *Freebox V3 (2004): [[Conexant]] CX82310 @168MHz *Freebox V4 (2004): [[Broadcom]] BCM6348 @256MHz *Freebox V5 «HD» (2006): [[Sigma Designs]] SMP8635 @300MHz *Freebox Ô (2007): [[Sigma Designs]] SMP8635 @300MHz *Freebox V6 «Revolution» (2010): [[Marvell]] 88F6281 @1.2GHz *Freebox V5 «Crystal» 1/2 (2013): [[Broadcom]] BCM6348 @256MHz *Freebox V6 «Mini 4K» (2015): [[Marvell]] 88F6281 @1.2GHz *Freebox V7 «One» (2018): [[Marvell]] 88F6281 @1.2GHz *Freebox V7 «Delta» (2018): [[Marvell]] 8040 Armada ([https://www.systemplus.fr/reverse-costing-reports/freebox-delta-server/ S] /[https://www.systemplus.fr/reverse-costing-reports/free-devialet-player/ P]) *Freebox V8 «Pop» (2020): [[Marvell]] 8040 Armada ===Disassemble=== Very hard because there is no screws outside, do look at the videos on Youtube :(need 2 knifes or blades in order to disable the 2 clips, those clips are :designed to plug the black external cover box to the red internal box). ==Images== Missing picture : HDD (SATA 2,5" 320GB), removed because it is fixed over the motherboard.
